formulas.name: IssueTypeFormula
formulas.expression: IF({!Which_category_does_the_member_s_request_or_info_about_the_member_most_relate_to} = "Property Issues","Property Issue", IF({!Which_category_does_the_member_s_request_or_info_about_the_member_most_relate_to} = "Shared Goods/Cleaning","Shared Goods + Cleaning", IF({!Which_category_does_the_member_s_request_or_info_about_the_member_most_relate_to} = "Leasing/Billing Inquiries","Lease and Billing Inquiries", IF({!Which_category_does_the_member_s_request_or_info_about_the_member_most_relate_to} = "Events/Community/Suitemate Issues","Events Community and Suitemate Issues", null ))))

formulas.name: IssueTypeFormulaNotifySuite
formulas.expression: IF({!Which_category_does_the_notice_most_closely_relate_to} = "Property Issues","Property Issue", IF({!Which_category_does_the_notice_most_closely_relate_to} = "Shared Goods/Cleaning","Shared Goods + Cleaning", IF({!Which_category_does_the_notice_most_closely_relate_to} = "Leasing/Billing Inquiries","Lease and Billing Inquiries", IF({!Which_category_does_the_notice_most_closely_relate_to} = "Events/Community/Suitemate Issues","Events Community and Suitemate Issues", null ))))

formulas.name: RequestFromMemberOwnerIDFormula
formulas.expression: IF( {!SelectedHome.BrandRef__r.Name}= "noah", "0053u000003Q6mhAAC", IF({!Which_category_does_the_member_s_request_or_info_about_the_member_most_relate_to} = "Property Issues","00G3u000002O6HhEAK", IF({!Which_category_does_the_member_s_request_or_info_about_the_member_most_relate_to} = "Shared Goods/Cleaning","00G3u000002O6HhEAK", IF({!Which_category_does_the_member_s_request_or_info_about_the_member_most_relate_to} = "Leasing/Billing Inquiries","00G3u000002O6HhEAK", IF({!Which_category_does_the_member_s_request_or_info_about_the_member_most_relate_to} = "Events/Community/Suitemate Issues","00G3u000002O6HhEAK", null )))))

formulas.name: RequestFromMemberRecordTypeIDFormula
formulas.expression:
IF(AND({!Which_category_does_the_member_s_request_or_info_about_the_member_most_relate_to} = "Property Issues", {!SelectedHome.BrandRef__r.Name}= "noah"),"0123u000000BVGUAA4", IF(AND({!Which_category_does_the_member_s_request_or_info_about_the_member_most_relate_to} = "Property Issues", {!SelectedHome.BrandRef__r.Name}= "kin"),"0123u000000BVMIAA4", IF( {!Which_category_does_the_member_s_request_or_info_about_the_member_most_relate_to} = "Property Issues", "0123u000000FQMU",
IF(AND({!Which_category_does_the_member_s_request_or_info_about_the_member_most_relate_to} = "Shared Goods/Cleaning", {!SelectedHome.BrandRef__r.Name}= "noah"),"0123u000000BVGUAA4", IF(AND({!Which_category_does_the_member_s_request_or_info_about_the_member_most_relate_to} = "Shared Goods/Cleaning", {!SelectedHome.BrandRef__r.Name}= "kin"),"0123u000000BVMIAA4", IF( {!Which_category_does_the_member_s_request_or_info_about_the_member_most_relate_to} = "Shared Goods/Cleaning", "0123u000000FQMZ",
IF(AND({!Which_category_does_the_member_s_request_or_info_about_the_member_most_relate_to} = "Leasing/Billing Inquiries", {!SelectedHome.BrandRef__r.Name}= "noah"),"0123u000000BVGZAA4", IF(AND({!Which_category_does_the_member_s_request_or_info_about_the_member_most_relate_to} = "Leasing/Billing Inquiries", {!SelectedHome.BrandRef__r.Name}= "kin"),"0123u000000BVMDAA4", IF( {!Which_category_does_the_member_s_request_or_info_about_the_member_most_relate_to} = "Leasing/Billing Inquiries", "0123u000000FQMe",
IF(AND({!Which_category_does_the_member_s_request_or_info_about_the_member_most_relate_to} = "Events/Community/Suitemate Issues", {!SelectedHome.BrandRef__r.Name}= "noah"), "0123u000000BVGZAA4", IF(AND({!Which_category_does_the_member_s_request_or_info_about_the_member_most_relate_to} = "Events/Community/Suitemate Issues", {!SelectedHome.BrandRef__r.Name}= "kin"), "0123u000000TNV4AAO", IF( {!Which_category_does_the_member_s_request_or_info_about_the_member_most_relate_to} = "Events/Community/Suitemate Issues", "0123u000000FQMj",
null ))))))))))))

formulas.name: SendNoticeOwnerIDFormula
formulas.expression: IF( {!SelectedHome.BrandRef__r.Name}= "noah", "0053u000003Q6mhAAC", IF( {!Which_category_does_the_notice_most_closely_relate_to} = "Property Issues","00G3u000002O6HhEAK", IF( {!Which_category_does_the_notice_most_closely_relate_to} = "Shared Goods/Cleaning","00G3u000002O6HhEAK", IF( {!Which_category_does_the_notice_most_closely_relate_to} = "Leasing/Billing Inquiries","00G3u000002O6HhEAK", IF( {!Which_category_does_the_notice_most_closely_relate_to} = "Events/Community/Suitemate Issues","00G3u000002O6HhEAK", null )))))

formulas.name: SendNoticeRecordTypeIDFormula
formulas.expression:
IF( AND({!Which_category_does_the_notice_most_closely_relate_to} = "Property Issues", {!SelectedHome.BrandRef__r.Name}= "noah"),"0123u000000BVGUAA4", IF( AND({!Which_category_does_the_notice_most_closely_relate_to} = "Property Issues", {!SelectedHome.BrandRef__r.Name}= "kin"),"0123u000000BVMIAA4", IF( {!Which_category_does_the_notice_most_closely_relate_to} = "Property Issues", "0123u000000FQMU",
IF( AND({!Which_category_does_the_notice_most_closely_relate_to} = "Shared Goods/Cleaning", {!SelectedHome.BrandRef__r.Name}= "noah"),"0123u000000BVGUAA4", IF( AND({!Which_category_does_the_notice_most_closely_relate_to} = "Shared Goods/Cleaning", {!SelectedHome.BrandRef__r.Name}= "kin"),"0123u000000BVMIAA4", IF( {!Which_category_does_the_notice_most_closely_relate_to} = "Shared Goods/Cleaning", "0123u000000FQMZ",
IF( AND({!Which_category_does_the_notice_most_closely_relate_to} = "Leasing/Billing Inquiries", {!SelectedHome.BrandRef__r.Name}= "noah"),"0123u000000BVGZAA4", IF( AND({!Which_category_does_the_notice_most_closely_relate_to} = "Leasing/Billing Inquiries", {!SelectedHome.BrandRef__r.Name}= "kin"),"0123u000000BVMDAA4", IF( {!Which_category_does_the_notice_most_closely_relate_to} = "Leasing/Billing Inquiries", "0123u000000FQMe",
IF( AND({!Which_category_does_the_notice_most_closely_relate_to} = "Events/Community/Suitemate Issues", {!SelectedHome.BrandRef__r.Name}= "noah"),"0123u000000BVGZAA4", IF( AND({!Which_category_does_the_notice_most_closely_relate_to} = "Events/Community/Suitemate Issues", {!SelectedHome.BrandRef__r.Name}= "kin"),"0123u000000TNV4AAO", IF( {!Which_category_does_the_notice_most_closely_relate_to} = "Events/Community/Suitemate Issues", "0123u000000FQMj",
null ))))))))))))

fields.name: AccesstoSuiteDisplaytext_0
fields.fieldText: If you are on the Real Estate Team looking to gain access to a suite for a tour, please follow this process instead of continuing with this form.

fields.name: Incorrect_password_message
fields.fieldText:
OOPS!


The password you entered is not correct. Please note: this is the internal Common employee support form. If you have gotten here by mistake please click here to return to the home page.


If you're an employee, please reach out to your manager who can share the password with you.

Thanks for submitting your request!


Our team will respond as soon as possible.


You can submit another request by refreshing your screen.
